net.roydesign.ui
Class AbstractScreenAction

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractAction
      net.roydesign.ui.AbstractScreenAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action
public abstract class AbstractScreenAction
extends javax.swing.AbstractAction

A subclass of javax.swing.AbstractAction that adds the logistics needed to make menu bars conform to the Mac OS screen menu bar requirements without sacrificing the usual way of presenting menu bars on other platforms. See the ScreenMenuBar and JScreenMenuBar classes for more details.

Version:
MRJ Adapter 1.2
See Also:
ScreenMenuBar, JScreenMenuBar, Serialized Form

Method Detail

addUserFrame

public void addUserFrame(java.lang.Class frameClass)
Add the given JFrame subclass as a user frame of the action. When an action has no user frame, then all frames get the action.

Parameters:
frameClass - the JFrame subclass
